mapper.insert: INSERT INTO post_info (user_email, user_nick, post_img, gender, style_tag, season, comment, created_at) VALUES (#{user_email}, #{user_nick}, #{post_img}, #{gender}, #{style_tag}, #{season}, #{comment}, now());
